hero.title: The intelligent
hero.subtitle: for your fitness studio
hero.description: ARIIA automates customer communication via WhatsApp, Telegram, and Voice. Increase your efficiency with Arnold Prime Orchestration.

features.title: Everything your studio
features.description: A complete ecosystem of AI agents seamlessly integrated into your existing systems.

swarm.title: Swarm Intelligence
swarm.desc: Specialized agents (Sales, Medic, Ops) work together to resolve every request.

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel
omnichannel.desc: WhatsApp, Telegram, SMS, and Voice. Reach your members where they are.

churn.title: Churn Prevention
churn.desc: AI-driven analysis identifies cancellation risks before they arise.

memory.title: Context Memory
memory.desc: ARIIA remembers every interaction and builds real relationships with members.

security.title: GDPR & Security
security.desc: Encrypted data storage in Germany and full compliance guarantee.

connectors.title: Deep Integration
connectors.desc: Direct connection to Magicline, Shopify, and more for real-time handling.

page.title: Next-Gen
page.description: ARIIA is more than a chatbot. It is a swarm of specialized AI agents that understand your studio and your members.
page.deckDesc: A central dashboard to monitor every AI interaction and manage your studio settings in real-time.
page.securityDesc: Your data is hosted in Germany, fully encrypted, and 100% GDPR compliant.

live.title: Live Monitor
live.desc: Watch AI interactions in real-time and intervene if necessary.

members.title: Member Management
members.desc: Deep integration with Magicline to handle bookings and contracts.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.desc: Upload your studio documents to train the AI on your specific rules.

prompts.title: Persona Control
prompts.desc: Customize the tone and personality of your studio assistant.

multi.title: Multi-Tenant
multi.desc: Manage multiple studio locations from a single central account.

churn.title: Churn Prevention
churn.desc: AI identifies members at risk of canceling based on behavior.

cta.title: Ready for the future of
cta.subtitle: Join over 50 fitness studios already growing with ARIIA.

footer.brandDesc: The evolution of studio operations. Agentic Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your studio operations. All plans include 24/7 AI availability and Magicline integration.
pricing.enterpriseDesc: Custom solutions for large studio chains with 10+ locations and specific compliance needs.
pricing.addonsDesc: Enhance your AI agents with specialized capabilities tailored to your workflow.
pricing.finalCtaDesc: Join 50+ fitness studios already using ARIIA.

voice.name: AI Voice Engine
voice.desc: Handle incoming calls with natural AI voice interaction.

vision.name: AI Vision (YOLOv8)
vision.desc: Real-time occupancy and safety tracking via camera integration.

churn.name: Churn Prediction
churn.desc: Advanced ML model to identify cancellation risks early.

channel.name: Additional Channel
channel.desc: Add custom SMS or Email automation to your swarm.

faqs.q: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your settings.
Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and all data is hosted in ISO-certified data centers in Germany.
Yes, for Enterprise customers we offer bespoke integration services for your specific CRM or ERP system.

faqs.q: How does the Voice AI work?
faqs.a: Our Voice AI uses advanced STT/TTS models to interact with callers in real-time, just like a human assistant.

impressum.disputeText: 欧州委員会はオンライン紛争解決（OS）のためのプラットフォームを提供しています: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/。当社のメールアドレスはインプリントの上部に記載されています。当社は、消費者仲裁委員会における紛争解決手続きに参加する意思はなく、またその義務もありません。
impressum.liabilityContentText: サービスプロバイダーとして、当社はTMG第7条第1項に従い、一般法に基づいてこれらのページ自体のコンテンツに対して責任を負います。TMG第8条から第10条に従い、当社はサービスプロバイダーとして、送信または保存された第三者の情報を監視したり、違法な活動を示す状況を調査したりする義務はありません。
impressum.liabilityLinksText: 当社のサービスには、コンテンツに影響を与えない第三者の外部ウェブサイトへのリンクが含まれています。したがって、これらの外部コンテンツについてはいかなる責任も負いかねます。リンク先のページのコンテンツについては、常に各ページの提供者または運営者が責任を負います。
